price: 91 Il en fut ainsi. Nous connaissions parfaitement tous les moyens à sa disposition.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
